task.title: Configure the parameters
task.shortdesc: Use the below procedure to configure the parameters for the Zipper service.

step.cmd: Open the directory where the Zipper service is installed in your system.
step.info: Mostly, the service installs in the C:\Program Files\Zipper Service directory. If the service is not installed in the same directory in your system, search Zipper Service in the Search field of the C drive.

step.cmd: Right-click in blank space the directory, and then select New Text Document to have a Notepad file in the directory.
step.info: If you have any other text editor installed in your system, you can use its document to create the configuration file.

step.cmd: Rename the file to Zipper Service.
Double-click the file or right-click and select Open to open the file.
Create the Zipping Values and Unzipping Values sections in the file.
Add the parameters as shown in the below example and replace values given in the angled brackets with the actual values.

image.alt: Add the parameters shown in the screen capture.

taskbody.result: The configuration file is ready to use by the Zipper Service.
